discussion.content: The amount of resources available in the short term is not a factor to consider when determining the length of a stage in PRINCE2. However, the amount of resources available for the project as a whole is a factor to consider when determining the length of a stage.

discussion.content: In PRINCE2, when you need to address a situation where a project cannot be completed within the time tolerance and you want to consider options like instructing the team manager to work overtime, you would typically capture this in the "Exception Report."
